news.title: Our paper accepted to CVPR 2025
news.content: Our paper 'FreeScene: Mixed Graph Diffusion for 3D Scene Synthesis from Free Prompts' has been accepted to CVPR 2025!

news.title: Our paper accepted to AAAI 2025
news.content: Our paper 'SigStyle: Signature Style Transfer via Personalized Text-to-Image Models' has been accepted to AAAI 2025!
